name: soother
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person or thing that makes someone more calm and less worried: Sarah was a toucher, a listener, a soother. The power of the will can prove an effective soother of the nerves.
something that makes a part of the body less painful: Ginger ale is an effective stomach soother. Try camomile as a soother for eczema.
US (UK dummy) a smooth rubber or plastic object that is given to a baby to suck in order to comfort it and make it stop crying: If the baby continues to cry, give it a soother. My baby refused to take a soother. Synonym
pacifier
